properties.comment: In key vom entry kommt der Dateiname OHNE Endung. Die SQL-Query danach. CDATA nutzen bei Sonderzeichen in der Query.
properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V2L1_ROS00.INGEST_TRACKING_RECORD_E_PUB_Q WHERE SIP_STATUS='AIP_FINISHED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V2L1_ROS00.INGEST_TRACKING_RECORD_E_PUB_Q WHERE SIP_STATUS='AIP_UPDATE_WAITING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V2L1_ROS00.INGEST_TRACKING_RECORD_E_PUB_Q WHERE SIP_STATUS='FEEDER_SUBMITTED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V2L1_ROS00.INGEST_TRACKING_RECORD_E_PUB_Q WHERE SIP_STATUS='FEEDER_UPDATED'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM V2L1_ROS00.INGEST_TRACKING_RECORD_E_PUB_Q WHERE SIP_STATUS='FINISHED'
